CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local summon_random = function() if(self.count < self.max_mon) then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") local loc = self:randomposition() local line = loc.z loc.z = 0 local spawn = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://11644b16-dbb5-46ce-ad79-77793401b9a1","arrow",loc,parent) wait(3) spawn:Destroy() self.num = self.num + 1 self.count = self.count + 1 local mon = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://maplestorymonster$98abc59220c14814a7f08012916caac8","Neutral"..self.num,loc,parent) mon.NeutralMonsterControl.line = line end end local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") for i = 1, 9,1 do local loc = self:randomposition() local line = loc.z loc.z = 0 self.num = self.num + 1 local mon = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://maplestorymonster$98abc59220c14814a7f08012916caac8","Neutral"..self.num,loc,parent) mon.NeutralMonsterControl.line = line end self.count = 9 _TimerService:SetTimerRepeat(summon_random,10)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: randomposition
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if (self.count >= 9) then return Vector3.zero end local x = math.random()*9 - 12 local tem = math.random(3) local y = 0 local z = 0 if(tem == 1) then if(self.top >= 3) then return self:randomposition() end y = 25 z = 1 self.top = self.top + 1 elseif tem == 2 then if(self.mid >= 3) then return self:randomposition() end y = 9 z = 2 self.mid = self.mid + 1 elseif tem == 3 then if(self.bot >= 3) then return self:randomposition() end y = -6 z = 3 self.bot = self.bot + 1 end
return Vector3(x,y,z)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleEntityDestroyEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if(Entity.NeutralMonsterControl ~= nil) then self.count = self.count - 1 if(Entity.NeutralMonsterControl.line == 1)then self.top = self.top - 1 elseif(Entity.NeutralMonsterControl.line == 2)then self.mid = self.mid - 1 elseif(Entity.NeutralMonsterControl.line == 3) then self.bot = self.bot - 1 end end
